| History                 = The Silent Stalkers are a Latino biker gang in NY City. When the mutant [[Wolf (Thunderiders) (Earth-616)|Wolf]] returned to his old neighborhood in NY City, he encountered the Silent Stalkers whom he intimidated to guard his motorcycle while he visited the Montoya family. The gang were insulted that he did not consider them good company and refused to let them ride his bike, and therefore pursued Wolf and attempted to take him down. He outraced and outfought the gang.{{r|Team America Vol 1 4}}
